item.description: Style Demo h1 Heading h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading This is bold text This is bold text This is italic text This is italic text Deleted text This is text with inline math $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} = 1$ and with math blocks: $$ \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} = 1 $$ Heading Another heading text text text text text text Block quotes are written like so.

About Me Modules Taken in NUS School of Computing 2019 / 2020 Semester 1 (Planned) CS2101: Effective Communication for Computing Professionals CS2103T: Software Engineering CS2105/6: Introduction to Computer Networks / Introduction to Operating Systems ST2334: Probability and Statistics GEH1036: Living with Mathematics Teaching Assistant (TA) Roles (Planned) CS1101S: Programming Methodology CS1010E: Programming Methodology 2018 / 2019 Summer Orbital 2019 Source Academy Summer Programme: Frontend Team Freshmen Orientation Week (FOW) 2019: Prologs 2018 / 2019 Semester 2 CS1010R: Programming Methodology CS2030: Programming Methodology II CS2040: Data Structures and Algorithms CS2100: Computer Organization IS1103: IS Innovations in Organisations and Society GER1000: Quantitative Reasoning GEQ1000: Asking Questions GES1021: Natural Heritage of Singapore 2018 / 2019 Semester 1 CS1101S: Programming Methodology CS1231: Discrete Structures MA1101R: Linear Algebra I MA1521: Calculus for Computing GET1020: Darwin and Evolution
Contact Feel free to contact me at

Portfolio Hack&Roll 2019: NUS Exams Countdown A simple exam countdown app for Hack&Roll 2019, my first hackathon. Github Repo Devpost Submission Todo List I created a simple todo list in Ruby on Rails as a CVWO (Computing for Voluntary Welfare Organisations) Assignment. Github Repo Heroku Deployment
